Class CheckSettingsStoresFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    A factory for creating CheckSettingsStores.

    ralf

    • Method Detail

      • createApplicationCheckSettingsStore

        public CheckSettingsStore createApplicationCheckSettingsStore(ApplicationStore applicationStore,
                                                     AcrolinxClient client)
        Creates a CheckSettingsStore using a ApplicationStore as back end.
        See: ApplicationStore
        Parameters:
        applicationStore - The ApplicationStore to be used.
        Note: You also could use the same as for the AcrolinxClient using AcrolinxClient.getStore().
        client -

      • createFileCheckSettingsStore

        public CheckSettingsStore createFileCheckSettingsStore(File storeFile,
                                              AcrolinxClient client)
        Creates a new CheckSettingsStore for storing settings in a file. The Acrolinx default is storing settings on the server.
        Parameters:
        storeFile - the file for storing the settings
        client - the client, see GuiFactory.createClient(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.client.ClientInformation, ApplicationStore)

      • createPropertiesStoreProviderCheckSettingsStore

        public CheckSettingsStore createPropertiesStoreProviderCheckSettingsStore(PropertiesStoreProvider propertiesStoreProvider,
                                                                 AcrolinxClient client)

      • createPropertiesCheckSettingsStore

        public CheckSettingsStore createPropertiesCheckSettingsStore(PropertiesStore propertiesStore,
                                                    AcrolinxClient client)
        Creates a CheckSettingsStore storing settings on PropertiesStore.
        Parameters:
        propertiesStore - the properties store to store the CheckSettings
        client - the client
        Returns:
        the created check settings store

      • createServerCheckSettingsStore

        public CheckSettingsStore createServerCheckSettingsStore(AcrolinxClient client,
                                                Localizer localizer)
        Creates a new server-based CheckSettingsStore. This is the default storage for Acrolinx check settings.
        Parameters:
        client - the client, see GuiFactory.createClient(com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.client.ClientInformation, ApplicationStore)
        localizer - the localizer, see GuiFactory.localizers()
        Returns:
        the check settings store
